Okay :)

If someone has not played a large role in the plot, there is certa=
inly no reason to bring them in I would think. My=C2=A0thought would be to =
tighten up the number of characters that we are individually playing so tha=
t no one gets overwhelmed and burnt out and yet we can keep things running =
smoothly. 

Airly is discussing a plot idea with me which sounds pretty coo=
l. So my questions are to Kraftlos and Sandy:=C2=A0Is there anything either=
 of you need from any of my characters to keep yours moving? I am about to =
post for the minions soon, but is there anything you need from that side?=
=C2=A0 

I am not sure who started the minion attack, it looks like Airly b=
ut=C2=A0I am not completely sure. The question is: Was there a specific rea=
son or goal in mind as to why attacking the Old Maximal Base? I don't want =
to ruin anyone's plans or goals. 

Preston


=C2=A0

>

t know how that would affect anything.=C2=A0=C2=A0 I think the maxmials hav=
e become one group again, but I don't know where Lord Rasorwing is (he hasn=
't really played a big role in the plot).
>
>

u can finish out the plans we had."
>>>

<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>If so=
meone has not played a large role in the plot, there is certainly no reason=
 to bring them in I would think. My thought would be to tighten up the=
 number of characters that we are individually playing so that no one gets =
overwhelmed and burnt out and yet we can keep things running smoothly. </DI=
V>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Airly is discussing a plot idea with me which sou=
nds pretty cool. So my questions are to Kraftlos and Sandy: Is there a=
nything either of you need from any of my characters to keep yours moving? =
I am about to post for the minions soon, but is there anything you need fro=
m that side?  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I am not sure who started =
the minion attack, it looks like Airly but I am not completely sure. T=
he question is: Was there a specific reason or goal in mind as to why attac=
king the Old Maximal Base? I don't want to ruin anyone's plans or goals. </=
DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Preston</DIV>
